name: appion-react-next-gatsby-app-landing
description: Modern Landing Pages Template Using React, Next, Styled Components and so on. It also support Gatsby Static site generator
author: Devscorn

scripts.next-build: rimraf dist && yarn workspace next-landing run build
scripts.next-prefirebase-serve: yarn run build-public && yarn run build-funcs && yarn workspace next-landing run build && yarn run copy-deps && yarn run install-deps
scripts.next-prefirebase-deploy: yarn run build-public && yarn run build-funcs && yarn workspace next-landing run build && yarn run copy-deps
scripts.pregatsby-firebase-serve: rimraf dist && yarn run gatsby-build && cpx "packages/gatsby-landing/public/**/*.*" "dist/public" -C
scripts.pregatsby-firebase-deploy: rimraf dist && yarn run gatsby-build && cpx "packages/gatsby-landing/public/**/*.*" "dist/public" -C
